name: Symphonic Source
tag_list: salesforce, dupecatcher, cloudingo, salesforce-dedupe, duplicate-lead, database-cleansing, data-extraction, data-transformation, etl, in-line-edit, salesforce-com
overview:
Symphonic Source develops groundbreaking applications for Salesforce CRM that not only improve productivity of users but also improve the quality of the data being entered. Symphonic Source is able to leverage the power of cloud-computing and hand the keys over to the system administrators and marketing managers who use and work with data inside salesforce.com on a daily basis.

Founded in 2010, Symphonic Source, Inc. provides powerful, affordable, and easy to use Salesforce data management software to more than 10,000 customers worldwide â€“ from Fortune 500 enterprises to small businesses. Much of the core team at Symphonic Source is comprised of start-up veterans from Tek-Tools, Inc. (now part of Solarwinds). The company takes a unique approach by building user-friendly cloud-based application focused on ease-of-use and simplicity, while still exceeding enterprise-grade performance expectations.

milestones.description: Cloudingo goes live on the Salesforce.com AppExchange
